instance.description: Returns the status of configured IPSec sessions.
instance.longDescription: Shows configuration settings and status for each configured IPSec tunnel in the network. The status is IPSEC_SESSION_ESTABLISHED for tunnels that are expected to be established; it is IKE_PHASE1_FAILED if IKE parameters negotiation failed; it is IKE_PHASE1_KEY_MISMATCH if IKE negotiation was successful but IKE keys do not match; it is IPSEC_PHASE2_FAILED if negotiation of IPsec parameters failed; and it is MISSING_END_POINT if the remote endpoint for a configured IPsec tunnel could not be found in the network.

nodes.description: Include sessions whose first node matches this specifier

remoteNodes.description: Include sessions whose second node matches this specifier

status.description: Only include IPSec sessions for which status matches this specifier
